name: One Minute in Universe
description:
Hi! This is our very first project, originally developed for the One Minute Game jam.

Your mission: To arrive at your destination driving a spaceship within one minute.
How to do so: Jumping between the orbits of planets, stars and black holes while avoiding asteroids. 
But these won't be your worst enemies along this trip; time is a key element, and it runs fast!

When orbiting around a celestial body, gravity will make time run faster depending on the mass of the object.
You will have just one minute to reach your destination, so time will be your most valuable resource and you need to take care of it.

How to play:

Press the space bar to launch the spaceship.
The spaceship will be launched in the direction it is pointing.
Try to aim at planets, stars or black holes in order to reach the finish line.
If you crash onto an asteroid, cross the borders of the screen or if you run out of time, you will lose the game.
